headline: Corning (NYSE:GLW) Powers New All-American Solar Module With Michigan-Made Components
summary: Corning (NYSE:GLW) recently announced a collaboration with Suniva Inc. and Heliene Inc. to bolster domestic solar module manufacturing, a strategic move tapping into the U.S. solar energy market. Despite this promising partnership, the stock experienced a 5% decline over the last quarter. This drop occurred amidst favorable earnings results, reporting sales growth for Q4; however, net income fell year-over-year. The company's efforts to enhance shareholder value through dividends and share...

headline: Corning, Suniva and Heliene Announce First ‘Made in America’ Solar Module Supply Chain
summary: CORNING, N.Y. & NORCROSS, Ga. & MOUNTAIN IRON, Minn., March 06, 2025--Suniva, the largest and oldest U.S. manufacturer of high-efficiency monocrystalline silicon solar cells, and Heliene Inc., a leading U.S. solar PV module manufacturer, today announced a landmark deal with Corning Incorporated (NYSE: GLW) to provide the U.S. domestic market with the only solar module made with polysilicon, wafers and cells manufactured in the United States.

raw.headline: Corning, Suniva and Heliene Announce First ‘Made in America’ Solar Module Supply Chain
raw.summary: CORNING, N.Y. & NORCROSS, Ga. & MOUNTAIN IRON, Minn., March 06, 2025--Suniva, the largest and oldest U.S. manufacturer of high-efficiency monocrystalline silicon solar cells, and Heliene Inc., a leading U.S. solar PV module manufacturer, today announced a landmark deal with Corning Incorporated (NYSE: GLW) to provide the U.S. domestic market with the only solar module made with polysilicon, wafers and cells manufactured in the United States.
